q1_general_response: {"answer": "Possible skin conditions that could resemble this lesion include: atypical nevus (dysplastic nevus), seborrheic keratosis, pigmented basal cell carcinoma, or melanoma."}
q2_dataset_response: {"answer": "Based on the image, concerning features include the dark, irregular pigmentation and ill-defined borders of the lesion. These characteristics raise suspicion for malignancy and warrant further dermatoscopic evaluation and possible biopsy."}
q1_general_question: What other skin conditions could match the appearance of this lesion/disease?
q2_dataset_question: What features in the image might suggest whether this lesion/skin disease is malignant?
